Summary: Saw a small light in the sky moving around in odd directions
divs: sighting detailsit was about 11pm in mid july when me and some friends were walking around we sat down on a curb for a break. the sky was clear that night so we were looking up. my friend points something out to me asking me what it is. it was a small light which looked like a star moving in the sky. i follow it with my eyes and it was speeding through the night sky. much faster then any plane or helicopter i had ever seen. while its going at this amazing speed it starts doing turns. it took a right turn the went straight again, then a another right turn, and then curved right and disappeared as if it went up into space. the whole siting lasted about 30-40 seconds. me and my friends were in awe afterwards. we know it could not have been a plane or helicopter because of the turns it was taking at a speed much faster then any plane or helicopter can go. i don't believe it was a shooting star either because shooting stars don't turn like that. heres a very rough direction of what the siting was like --------------------- | | ------------ | | ------- \ \ ---------
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There were no other sightings in Omaha on or around July 16th 2006
